headline: Citi upgrades Hasbro as it sees limited downside from tariffs
summary: Investing.com -- Citi upgraded Hasbro Inc (NASDAQ:HAS) to Buy from Neutral saying robust growth in its gaming unit, specifically Wizards of the Coast, is outweighing concerns over new U.S. tariffs and weak consumer spending.

raw.headline: Citi upgrades Hasbro as it sees limited downside from tariffs
raw.summary: Investing.com -- Citi upgraded Hasbro Inc (NASDAQ:HAS) to Buy from Neutral saying robust growth in its gaming unit, specifically Wizards of the Coast, is outweighing concerns over new U.S. tariffs and weak consumer spending.

headline: Hasbro Stock Jumps 16% After Earnings Beat, But Tariff Threat Looms Large
summary: The company said U.S. tariffs on Chinese imports could cost up to $300 million in 2025.

raw.headline: Hasbro Stock Jumps 16% After Earnings Beat, But Tariff Threat Looms Large
raw.summary: The company said U.S. tariffs on Chinese imports could cost up to $300 million in 2025.

headline: Hasbro Q1 revenue increases 17%
summary: The toy company, which is undergoing a turnaround effort, continued to advocate for tariff exceptions in its sector.
